title: Chronicle: Dark Fantasy Music for Fictional Worlds Vol. 3
description: 10 Tracks of cinematic orchestral music for fantasy RPG or action/adventure games.
longDescription:
This is the follow-up to my previously released Dark Fantasy Music Collection. Preview on YOUTUBE and

full tracks can also be heard on SOUNDCLOUD.


This asset pack includes 10 tracks of cinematic orchestral fantasy music: 30 minutes of loopable content, some with multiple variations. All loops are coded and ready to be incorporated into your project with the new Unreal 5 sample-accurate MetaSounds engine. Intros transition seamlessly into looping tracks without pops or clicks.


Note: Unreal version 4 assets are available, but will not include MetaSounds. Version 4 will only include .WAV and Sound Cue files. MetaSounds is only included in Unreal 5.0 or later, and must be activated in plugins.



Track List:


1. Chronicle (3:18)

  • Single Pass
  • Looped (with intro)

2. Remembrance (3:15)

  • Single Pass
  • Looped (with intro)

3. Obsidian Knights (3:02)

  • Single Pass
  • 3 Loop Variations (with intros)
  • Ending Single Pass

4. Glimmering Peaks (2:51)

  • Single Pass
  • Looped (with intro)

5. Eight Legs (2:43)

  • Single Pass
  • Looped (with intro)

6. Blade of Cursed Light (3:01)

  • Single Pass
  • Looped (with intro)

7. Dark Prophecy (2:52)

  • Single Pass
  • Looped (with intro)

8. Dead Dancer (3:09)

  • Single Pass
  • Looped (with intro)

9. Gift of Mortality (2:57)

  • Single Pass
  • Looped (with intro)

10. The Desolation (3:30)

  • Single Pass
  • Looped (with 2 intro variations)
  • 3 ending durations
  • Intro Single Pass
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  10 fully looping orchestral tracks with multiple variations
  •  Detailed orchestral music for fantasy settings
  •  MetaSounds codes are included for all loops for seamless intro transitions into looping segments.

Number of Audio Wavs: 39

Number of Audio Cues: 39

Number of MetaSounds: 27 (these combine intro and looping Wavs into ready-to-use code)

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz, 16 bit

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 30 minutes

Supported Development Platforms: All

Important/Additional Notes: Use of MetaSounds codes require Unreal Engine 5.0.
